full_output.summary: Energetic and knowledgeable recent graduate with a strong background in both web development and software development. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and experienced with backend technologies like Node.js. Additionally, well-versed in software development with expertise in programming languages such as C++ and Python. Capable of designing and implementing robust web applications and software solutions. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, effective communication skills, and a commitment to continuous learning and development.

projects.name: Myntra Clone
projects.description: The primary objective of our Myntra clone project is to recreate the design and basic functionality of the Myntra website. This includes replicating the layout, visual style, and user interface elements, as well as implementing key features such as product listings, a shopping cart, and user forms.

projects.name: Food Delivery Website
projects.description: Created a user-friendly website enabling customers to order food online. Integrated a menu and ordering system with dynamic user interaction capabilities.

projects.name: Gym Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a website for gym membership registrations. Implemented a form submission feature allowing users to sign up for memberships online.
